name: Bullets n' Blades
description:
HOW TO PLAY

Survive as long as you can! Balance your usage of sword and gun - use too much of one, and it will be disabled for a couple seconds.

CONTROLS

Sword: WASD to move, [space] to swing

Gun: Right click to move, left click to shoot towards mouse

CREDITS

Kenny Park - visual design, programming

Brian Tam - programming

Music - DOVA SYNDROME
